sys_element_mapping.value:
active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM : Verify AppTrack Records^description=Please fill out the below details - Application Details ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Software Products : Software Version : Apptrack ID : AD Group : Deployment Environment : Special Instructions :
Note: If there is no appTrack ID, please reach out to New Products team

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^short_description=SAM -Implementation, Monitoring & Reporting^description=1. Implementation Push deployment in Phases (Sequentially) 2. Monitor each phase and troubleshoot if necessary 3. Reporting the outcome of each phase and capture the details in the notes and email. 4. After successful completion, provide the details to the stakeholders

sys_element_mapping.value: {{4d284af4-5724-49c2-bd67-81074b8b6ff0.record.description}}^active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM - Create PP1/CAS SCTASK Request ^description=Below mentioned steps are to be followed while creating PP1 package : ----------------------------------------------------------------------------﻿ 1. Create PP1 package, verify is working as expected 2. Create PP1 package and test the functionality 3. Verify if the application is working as expected 4. After successful testing create CAS package

active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM - Quality Assurance Testing^description=Designated developer, not the change coordinator, will test the change
FOLLOW THE STEPS BELOW TO COMPLETE THE QA FOR THIS CHANGE 1. Review CRQ for data accuracy and integrity 2. Verify folder structure matches production 3. Review Install plan and Back-out plan for completeness and accuracy 4. Review QA Form below for completeness and accuracy 5. Follow instructions for the "Suggested Test Plan" below to thoroughly test the change 6. Review additional documentation provided in the Work Detail Section for accuracy and completeness 7. Review ServiceNow forms (if applicable) 8. Review implementation tasks to ensure it is completed and make sure implementation dates are added ==========================================
QA Form - Test Environment -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Loads to Test: GME: X64 Physical Computer Required : Yes/No Other Applications required for Testing Aditional Environment Requirements : Additional Background Information : Suggested Test Plan : Indicator of Success : Out of Scope/Known Issues :

change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"OS and Device Management Engineering","value":"99974402db23f700121ed5ab5e961918"}^short_description=SAM - DWS Review - Application Changes^description=EUC Reviewer: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Review the CHQ a. Description Field b. Scheduled Dates c. Install Plan d. Backout Plan e. Test Plan f. Risk level
2. Contact Change Coordinator if you have any questions
3. Add any comments or concerns that you may have in regards to the change
4. Close task when you have completed your review

change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"Windows Tools","value":"e5974402db23f700121ed5ab5e961983"}^short_description=SAM -Create request for PUSH deployme^description=Create a PUSH deployment for below application {{4d284af4-5724-49c2-bd67-81074b8b6ff0.record.description}}

sys_element_mapping.value:
active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM - Quality Assurance Testing^description=Designated developer, not the change coordinator, will test the change
FOLLOW THE STEPS BELOW TO COMPLETE THE QA FOR THIS CHANGE 1. Review CRQ for data accuracy and integrity 2. Verify folder structure matches production 3. Review Install plan and Back-out plan for completeness and accuracy 4. Review QA Form below for completeness and accuracy 5. Follow instructions for the "Suggested Test Plan" below to thoroughly test the change 6. Review additional documentation provided in the Work Detail Section for accuracy and completeness 7. Review ServiceNow forms (if applicable) 8. Review implementation tasks to ensure it is completed and make sure implementation dates are added ==========================================
QA Form - Test Environment -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Loads to Test: GME: X64 Physical Computer Required : Yes/No Other Applications required for Testing Aditional Environment Requirements : Additional Background Information : Suggested Test Plan : Indicator of Success : Out of Scope/Known Issues :

change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"Windows Tools","value":"e5974402db23f700121ed5ab5e961983"}^short_description=SAM -Create request for PUSH deployme^description=Create a PUSH deployment for below application {{4d284af4-5724-49c2-bd67-81074b8b6ff0.record.description}}

active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM : Verify AppTrack Records^description=Please fill out the below details - Application Details ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Software Products : Software Version : Apptrack ID : AD Group : Deployment Environment : Special Instructions :
Note: If there is no appTrack ID, please reach out to New Products team

{{4d284af4-5724-49c2-bd67-81074b8b6ff0.record.description}}^active=true^assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=SAM - Create PP1/CAS SCTASK Request ^description=Below mentioned steps are to be followed while creating PP1 package : ----------------------------------------------------------------------------﻿ 1. Create PP1 package, verify is working as expected 2. Create PP1 package and test the functionality 3. Verify if the application is working as expected 4. After successful testing create CAS package

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"Application Delivery-Packaging","value":"5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0"}^short_description=SAM -Implementation, Monitoring & Reporting^description=1. Implementation Push deployment in Phases (Sequentially) 2. Monitor each phase and troubleshoot if necessary 3. Reporting the outcome of each phase and capture the details in the notes and email. 4. After successful completion, provide the details to the stakeholders

sys_element_mapping.value:
change_request={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^assignment_group={"display":"OS and Device Management Engineering","value":"99974402db23f700121ed5ab5e961918"}^short_description=SAM - DWS Review - Application Changes^description=EUC Reviewer: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Review the CHQ a. Description Field b. Scheduled Dates c. Install Plan d. Backout Plan e. Test Plan f. Risk level
2. Contact Change Coordinator if you have any questions
3. Add any comments or concerns that you may have in regards to the change
4. Close task when you have completed your review
